page.title: 01 The Review
page.content: 1 The area is mainly lush green farmland.There are about 16 farms. It contains the two tranquil villages of{ {Costock}and{Rempstone.}Although it is quiet ,the silence is regularly broken by planes going to and from East Midlands Airport. There are two main roads,the{A60}goes from Loughborough to Mansfield and passes through Costock and Rempstone. The other road is the{A6006}which goes from Melton to Zouch and passes through Rempstone. {Costock}has a{school}but{Rempstone's {school}has closed. Both villages are in the original{ {Domesday Book of 1086.} The whole area has{gypsum}and it is extracted by{British Gypsum}in Gotham.
